semantics.label: Užduoties aprašymas
semantics.description: Paaiškinkite savo besimokantiesiems, ko iš jų tikimasi.

fields.label: Užuominos
fields.description: Pasirinktinai pridėkite užuominų ar konkrečių instrukcijų šiam skyriui.

fields.label: Svoris
fields.description: Nustatykite, kokio ilgio turėtų būti kiekvienas skyrius kitų skyrių atžvilgiu. Pavyzdys: 1 skyrius = 1; 2 skyrius = 3 (trigubas 1 ilgis); 3 skyrius = 1 (toks pat ilgis kaip ir 1 dalis).

semantics.label: Veikimo nustatymai
semantics.description: Šios parinktys leis jums valdyti, kaip veikia užduotis.

fields.label: Slack
fields.description: Slack is built-in flexibility of a section's length, calculated in percentage.

fields.label: Minimalus teksto ilgis
fields.description: Define an absolute minimum total text length. Please note that a section's weight compared to other sections is the main driver for the feedback message, not this minimum value.

fields.label: Maksimalus teksto ilgis
fields.description: Define an absolute maximum total text length. Please note that a section's weight compared to other sections is the main driver for the feedback message, not this maximum value.

fields.label: Grįžtamojo ryšio režimas
fields.description: Decide whether you want to display feedback while typing or only when the student requests it.

fields.label: All sections good
fields.description: Feedback text shown when all sections are of tolerable length.
fields.default: Your sections' lengths are all fine.

fields.label: Sekcija per trumpa
fields.description: Feedback text shown for sections that are too short (@title will be replaced by the section title, @chars will be replaced by the number of characters missing).
fields.default: Your section "@title" is too short. You need at least @chars more characters.

fields.label: Sekcija per ilga
fields.description: Feedback text shown for sections that are too long (@title will be replaced by the section title, @chars will be replaced by the number of characters needing removal).
fields.default: Your section "@title" is too long. Remove at least @chars characters.

fields.label: Sekcija per trumpa (kai rašoma)
fields.description: Status shown when typing for sections that are too short (@chars will be replaced by the number of characters missing).

fields.label: Sekcija per ilga (kai rašoma)
fields.description: Status shown when typing for sections that are too long (@chars will be replaced by the number of characters needing removal).

fields.label: Negalima nukopijuoti į iškarpinę
fields.default: Jūsų teksto nebuvo galima nukopijuoti į iškarpinę

fields.label: Text for "No section" message
fields.default: There was no section given for this structure strip.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Check" button
fields.default: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.

fields.label: Assistive technology description for "Retry" button
fields.default: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.

fields.label: Copy your text to the clipboard (text for readspeakers)
